articles.author: https://www.cnbctv18.com
articles.title: A 10 year old Australian girl develops ‘the most painful condition’: All you need to know about CRPS - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS) is the most painful disorder known to mankind, which causes excruciating pain in multiple body parts. To get the best possible treatment, Bella and her mother have travelled to the US.
